response.original_title: Behind the Scenes of 'Transmissions': Making Ourselves Seen / Heard
response.overview: Looking into the dreams, ideas, processes, personalities and joy behind the making of the Transmissions trailer during the Transforming Cinema Film project, which was run by E.D.E.N. Film Productions, funded by The National Lottery Community Fund and supported by the Postcode Neighbourhood Trust.
response.title: Behind the Scenes of 'Transmissions': Making Ourselves Seen / Heard
